title: HOUR 1 - Browns, Rodgers, Lakers
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Browns, Rodgers, Lakers
description:
The rumors of the Browns wanting to upgrade at QB are true

The details of Aaron Rodgers' contract were correct

The Lakers were humiliated last night


Guest: Peter Schrager
